problem_statement: Teams and individuals need a way to reuse standardized checklists while tracking completion separately for each use.
FAIL_TO_PASS: tests/checklist.test.ts::Checklist Manager Integration::Req 2: Should create a reusable checklist template
tests/checklist.test.ts::Checklist Manager Integration::Req 3 & 4: Should create checklist instance from template (independent)
tests/checklist.test.ts::Checklist Manager Integration::Req 6: Should allow marking items done/undone
tests/checklist.test.ts::Checklist Manager Integration::Req 5 & 7 & 8: Support required vs optional and completion status
tests/checklist.test.ts::Checklist Manager Integration::Req 8: Allow archiving checklists
tests/checklist.test.ts::Checklist Manager Integration::Req 4: Template edits must not affect existing instances
tests/ui-accessibility.test.ts::UI Components and Accessibility (Req 11)::Loading States::should have Suspense boundaries in pages
tests/ui-accessibility.test.ts::UI Components and Accessibility (Req 11)::Loading States::should have loading.tsx or Suspense in template routes
tests/ui-accessibility.test.ts::UI Components and Accessibility (Req 11)::Progress and Status Display::should display progress in instance detail page
